definition: the event of being born, to cause to be born
details:
noun
- the event of being born
= example: the event of being born
= synonyms: nativity
- a baby born
- the process of giving birth
= synonyms: parturition, giving birth, birthing
- the kinship relation of an offspring to the parents
= synonyms: parentage
- the time when something begins (especially life)
= example: the time when something begins (especially life)
verb
- to cause to be born
= example: to cause to be born
= synonyms: bear
